items.title: Old Fashioned
items.subtitle: Classic Bourbon cocktail with 10-year old Eagle Rare, bitters, and hints of orange.

items.title: Whiskey Sour
items.subtitle: Buffalo Trace bourbon, lemon juice, simple syrup, and optional egg white.

items.title: Electric Lemonade
items.subtitle: Absolut Citron, Blue Curaçao, sweet & sour, and Sprite. Served with a glowing surprise.

items.title: Sazerac
items.subtitle: Rittenhouse 100 Rye, Pierre Ferrand 1840 Cognac, bitters, lemon.

items.title: Moscow Mule
items.subtitle: Charbay Vodka, homemade ginger syrup, lime juice, club soda in copper tin.

items.title: Cosmopolitan
items.subtitle: Grey Goose vodka, Cointreau, cranberry juice, lime juice. Sweet and delicious.

items.title: Vesper Martini
items.subtitle: James Bond’s drink of choice. Gordon’s, vodka, Kina Lillet. Shaken, not stirred.

items.title: Sidecar
items.subtitle: Pierre Ferrand 1840 Cognac, Cointreau, lemon juice, homemade cane sugar syrup.

items.title: Mint Julep
items.subtitle: Classic Kentucky Derby libation. Baker’s bourbon served with a mint bouquet in a copper tin.

items.title: Kamikaze
items.subtitle: Equal parts Grey Goose vodka, Cointreau, lime juice with lime spiral.

items.title: Gin & Tonic
items.subtitle: Simply classic. Bombay gin with tonic service with a giant ice cube. No frills.

items.title: Margarita
items.subtitle: Jose Cuervo Tequila and margarita mix. Blended with ice for frozen deliciousness.

items.title: Piña Colada
items.subtitle: Malibu Coconut rum, pineapple juice, and cream. Blended to island perfection.

items.title: Martini
items.subtitle: Grey Goose vodka or Tanqueray gin with extra dry vermouth served with stuffed green olives.

items.title: Hot Apple Toddy
items.subtitle: Bulleitt bourbon, hot apple cider, honey, lemon wedge, and a cinnamon stick.

items.title: Rum & Coke
items.subtitle: Bacardi rum mixed with Mexican Coca-Cola. It’s hard to go wrong with this one.

items.title: Screwdriver
items.subtitle: Odwalla orange juice and Absolut vodka stirred. Always refreshing.

items.title: Shirley Temple
items.subtitle: A sweet, nonalcholic delite. Sprite and homemade Grenadine. Ellen’s non-alcholic go to.
